attributes.action: Allow parents to take their kids on holidays during school term
attributes.additional_details:
Some of us parents have not been able to afford a holiday for many years now due to prices.
The school term times have been incredibly more affordable for us and in some cases is the only times that some of us parents can take time off as during school holidays we can not take time off due to work and other commitments.
Fining parents for taking their kids on holiday is not acceptable and we the people want it law that we can be granted on holiday forms with out fines.
attributes.background:
Holiday prices are increasing more and more and the of term prices are just not affordable.
The teachers can book their holidays off during school term, so parents should be allowed too, with out a fine.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petitions, which call for similar action:

Allow all children to take 10 days holiday leave during term time.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/641937

Allow parents to take their children out of school for up to 20 days a year
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/643520
